news.headline: USPS to continue accepting China and Hong Kong packages in February.
Vertiv (NYSE: VRT) to attend Citi's 2025 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conf on Feb 19, 2025, 10:30am EST. CEO & CFO to speak.
news.summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio - Vertiv (NYSE: VRT), a leading global provider of critical digital infrastructure and continuity solutions, shared plans to partake in two investor conferences in February. CEO Giordano Albertazzi and CFO David Fallon are set to engage in a fireside chat at Citi’s 2025 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference in Miami, FL, on February 19, 2025, at 10:30 a.m. Eastern Time. The event aims to provide insights into Vertiv's strategies and performance to investors and stakeholders.

news.headline: Wolters Kluwer's UpToDate ranked #1 by KLAS for Patient-Driven Care Management and Patient Education in the 2025 Best in KLAS report released.
news.summary: A company based in Waltham, Massachusetts, Wolters Kluwer Health, has received top rankings in the 2025 Best in KLAS - Software and Services report. The report, released today by KLAS Research, a firm focusing on evaluating healthcare vendors, rated Wolters Kluwer Health's two UpToDate® solutions as top performers. Specifically, UpToDate Patient-Driven Care Management and Patient Education were recognized as leading solutions that empower patients to take an active role in managing and engaging in their care. These UpToDate Patient Engagement solutions are integral parts of Wolters Kluwer Health's offerings.

news.headline: Wisedocs introduces WiseChat and Custom Reports, AI-driven tools to simplify medical record and claims reviews.
news.summary: In Toronto, Wisedocs has introduced two new AI-powered features, WiseChat Q&A and Custom Reports, aimed at simplifying the handling of intricate medical records and claims processing. These innovative tools combine artificial intelligence technology with expert monitoring to enhance efficiency.

news.headline: Viz.ai study shows improved post-stroke care with Viz Connect, boosting cardiac monitoring and patient satisfaction.
news.summary: In San Francisco, Viz.ai, a prominent company in utilizing AI for disease detection and care coordination, revealed findings from a clinical study featured in The Neurohospitalist. The study showcased the significant effects of the Viz Connect care pathway on enhancing post-stroke patient care. Results indicate that integrating Viz Connect led to enhancements in cardiac monitoring utilization,† as well as improvements in care efficiency, healthcare provider (HCP) experience, and patient satisfaction.

news.headline: DigitalOcean (NYSE: DOCN) to host Investor Day in New York on April 4, 2025. CEO Paddy Srinivasan to present. Limited in-person attendance.
news.summary: DigitalOcean Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: DOCN) has confirmed that it is organizing an Investor Day in New York City on April 4, 2025. The event will feature presentations by DigitalOcean CEO Paddy Srinivasan and key members of the management team. Attendance at the event is limited to invited guests only. Those interested in attending in person can request more details by contacting investors@digitalocean.com, as space will be limited.

news.headline: Better.com introduces Better Forever loyalty program, offering waived origination fees for refinance or purchase loans, advancing affordable homeownership. (characters: 130)
news.summary: A leading digital homeownership company, Better Home & Finance Holding Company, known as Better.com, announced the introduction of Better Forever loyalty program. The program, aimed at rewarding customers, consists of waived origination fees on future refinance or purchase loans. This initiative signifies a significant milestone in Better's goal of simplifying and lowering the costs of homeownership. Customers who have funded a loan with Better Mortgage will be eligible for this program, with the aim of making homeownership more accessible and affordable.

news.headline: ON24 (NYSE: ONTF) honors leaders in digital engagement for achieving tangible results with innovative experiences in 2024.
news.summary: Today in San Francisco, ON24 (NYSE: ONTF) honored customers excelling in digital engagement for B2B sales and marketing. These businesses are seeing success in creating unique digital experiences for their stakeholders. In 2024, these leaders have embraced AI and personalization through the ON24 Intelligent Engagement Platform to set themselves apart, drive ROI, and establish new standards in the industry.

news.headline: Arcitecta leads in Coldago Research's Map 2024 for Unstructured Data Management, ranking first in vision and strategy.
news.summary: A company based in Boulder, Colorado and Melbourne, Australia, Arcitecta, has been recognized as a Leader in Coldago Research's Map 2024 for Unstructured Data Management. They secured the top position for vision and strategy in this report.

news.headline: Palella Holdings acquires Wash Out Srl from Telepass S.p.A. in Milan, a company with €6 million revenue, appoints new CEO and GM.
news.summary: Milan-based company Wash Out Srl has been acquired by Palella Holdings, owned by Salvatore Palella, from Telepass S.p.A. The acquisition includes all of Wash Out Srl's shares and comes with a substantial revenue of over €6 million. Wash Out focuses on vehicle care for individuals and businesses, utilizing digital tools for efficient management. As part of the deal, Gianluca Spriano has been named the new CEO and Guido Consoli the General Manager of Wash Out Srl.

news.headline: LevelBlue released its inaugural 2025 Threat Trends Report, highlighting a surge in Phishing-as-a-Service kits.
news.summary: In Dallas, LevelBlue, a reputable company offering managed network security services, managed detection and response, consulting, and threat intelligence, has launched the 2025 LevelBlue Threat Trends Report, Edition One. This report examines prevalent cyber threats observed from June 1 to November 30, 2024. The report, crafted by the LevelBlue security operations and LevelBlue Labs teams, highlights significant findings. One key revelation is the increasing use of phishing-as-a-service (PhaaS) kits.

news.headline: Radformation gets MDR CE Mark for AutoContour, ClearCheck, ClearCalc, and ChartCheck software solutions.
news.summary: In New York, Radformation Inc., a leading provider of radiation oncology software, has successfully obtained the EU Medical Device Regulation (MDR) CE Mark certification for their AutoContour, ClearCheck, ClearCalc, and ChartCheck products. This certification confirms Radformation's compliance with the EU Regulation 2017/745 and other applicable standards, demonstrating their commitment to meeting rigorous health, safety, and environmental protection criteria. This achievement solidifies Radformation's position as a global pioneer in radiation oncology solutions.

news.headline: Celigo's 2025 Partner Excellence Awards celebrate global partners for innovation and customer success.
news.summary: In San Mateo, California, Celigo, a prominent integration-platform-as-a-service (iPaaS) provider, revealed the recipients of its 2025 Partner Awards. This recognition acknowledges the outstanding performance of Systems Integration and Alliance partners worldwide. The awards highlight the significant contribution of partner collaboration and support to Celigo’s delivery strategy. These esteemed partners were chosen for their exceptional achievements in innovation, dedication to training and skill enhancement, and their ability to deliver superior results.

news.headline: AlidaBio introduces EpiPlex™ platform in 8 and 24 sample formats for RNA modification research.
news.summary: A new platform called EpiPlex™ has been launched by AlidaBio in San Diego. It is available in 8 and 24 sample formats and is designed for conducting multi-target, quantitative analysis of RNA modifications.

news.headline: Intel 471 partners with Retail and Hospitality ISAC to strengthen cybersecurity for organizations.
news.summary: A partnership has been formed between Intel 471 and RH-ISAC in Wilmington, Delaware to strengthen cybersecurity measures for retail and hospitality sectors. This collaboration aims to improve the security capabilities of organizations within these industries. Intel 471 is known for its expertise in cyber threat intelligence, while RH-ISAC specializes in enhancing cybersecurity for retail and hospitality businesses. This joint effort will help protect sensitive data and networks, safeguarding against potential cyber threats.

news.headline: RAC wins SmartBear award for cutting testing time in half with Zephyr Scale’s AI-based no-code automation.
news.summary: In Somerville, Massachusetts, SmartBear recently recognized the RAC for successfully reducing testing time by 50%. The organization achieved this milestone by implementing Zephyr Scale's AI-driven no-code automation solution, which led to improved efficiency in their processes.

news.headline: Dell'Oro Group raises forecast for data center liquid cooling and rack power distribution in 2024, with orders spreading to Tier 2 providers.
news.summary: In a recent report from Dell'Oro Group, a trusted market information source, it was revealed that the actual results for 2024 surpassed earlier forecasts. This growth was notable as orders shifted from Tier 1 to Tier 2 data center cloud service providers. The report, released on February 5, 2025, highlighted a significant uptick in numbers across the sector. This shift signifies a positive trend in the industry, with numbers indicating a strong move towards Tier 2 providers experiencing increased demand and usage. The data center cloud service sector is witnessing a notable evolution in the market landscape, as indicated by the shifting order patterns.

news.headline: Blueprint Medicines Corp to share Q4 & full year 2024 financials on Feb 13, 2025, via live conference call.
news.summary: A live conference call and webcast hosted by Blueprint Medicines Corporation (NASDAQ: BPMC) is scheduled for 8:00 a.m. ET on Thursday, February 13, 2025. The purpose of this event is to announce the financial results for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024.

news.headline: Lifesum revolutionizes meal tracking with Multimodal Tracker using AI for personalized nutrition.
news.summary: In Los Angeles on February 5, 2025, Lifesum, a top healthy eating app worldwide, has revolutionized meal tracking with an innovative AI-driven Multimodal Tracker for personalized nutrition. This tool allows users to easily record meals through photos, voice commands, text inputs, or barcodes. By incorporating this feature, Lifesum sets itself apart from other apps in the market.

news.headline: Aviatrix appoints new CRO and CMO to enhance leadership team amid rising demand in cloud network security market.
news.summary: In Santa Clara, California, on February 5, 2025, Aviatrix®, a cloud network security company, announced vital additions to its leadership team. The aim is to boost market penetration and maximize opportunities in the growing cloud networking sector. This move comes as part of the company's strategy to enhance its position in the market.

news.headline: Chris Barton, Shazam founder, to keynote Scale Computing's Platform//2025 event; event agenda live. Indianapolis, Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: Today, in Indianapolis, on February 5th, 2025, Scale Computing unveiled that Chris Barton, the originator and former CEO of Shazam, will be the keynote speaker at their event. Scale Computing is a prominent figure in edge computing, virtualization, and hyperconverged solutions. The company also disclosed that the event agenda has been made available to the public.

news.headline: Aethlon Medical (Nasdaq: AEMD) to release fiscal Q3 results on Feb 12, 2025, focusing on cancer and infectious diseases.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Aethlon Medical, Inc. revealed plans to release financial results for its third fiscal quarter. The company, traded on Nasdaq under the symbol AEMD, specializes in medical therapeutics for cancer and infectious diseases. The upcoming report will cover performance data for the quarter ending [specific date].

news.headline: Hub International acquires Lindenwood Agency in St. Louis to expand insurance capabilities. Terms undisclosed.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Chicago, Hub International Limited (Hub), a prominent global insurance brokerage and financial services firm, revealed the successful acquisition of Lindenwood Agency, Inc. The specifics of the deal remain undisclosed. This acquisition further solidifies Hub's position in the market and demonstrates their commitment to expansion and growth.

news.headline: Reign Storm Energy launches new Tropical flavor with Madelyn Cline, zero sugar drink. Island vibes in a can.
news.summary: A popular celebrity recently shared how the newly launched Reign Storm Tropical, a zero sugar plant-based energy drink by Reign Storm, is enhancing her daily routine. This innovative beverage, released on February 5th, 2025, is revolutionizing the energy drink market by offering a healthier alternative. With its tropical flavor, Reign Storm Tropical is captivating consumers and providing them with a unique island-inspired experience. The drink's success is indicative of the increasing demand for better-for-you energy products.

news.headline: AerSale's CEO to present at TD Cowen's 46th Annual Aerospace & Defense Conference on Feb 12, 2025 at 2:05 pm ET.
news.summary: AerSale Corporation (ASLE) disclosed that CEO Nicolas Finazzo is scheduled to speak at TD Cowen’s 46th Annual Aerospace & Defense Conference on Feb 12, 2025, at 2:05 pm ET. Additionally, he will hold investor meetings. The presentation will be live-streamed at [link provided] or on AerSale’s Investor Relations website at https://ir.a.

news.headline: MACOM's MESC awarded multi-year contract from BPI to lead in semiconductor product dev. Next gen Ka-band MMIC focus.
news.summary: MACOM Technology Solutions Inc. in Lowell, Mass., shared that its European Semiconductor Center in France, MESC, has secured a multi-year deal from Banque Publique d'Investissement (BPI). This contract aims to spearhead the creation and production of cutting-edge semiconductor products with the assistance of various public and private organizations. Under the 'MAGENTA' initiative, the plan is to innovate next-generation Ka-band Monolithic Microwave Integrated Circuit (MMIC) technology.

news.headline: Renova Technology partners with Flock Safety to enhance product sustainability, extend lifecycle. - 120 characters
news.summary: Renova Technology, Inc., based in Norcross, Georgia, announced on February 5, 2025, that they have partnered with Flock Safety, a comprehensive crime prevention technology company. This collaboration aims to enhance the longevity of Flock Safety products. Renova Technology, known for its repair and supply chain services, has cemented a contractual relationship with Flock Safety to achieve this goal. The partnership is significant as it combines Renova’s expertise with Flock Safety’s innovative solutions. Flock Safety's products are designed to combat crime effectively, and this alliance is set to prolong the life cycle of these technologies.

news.headline: Automaker Stellantis will release its full year 2024 results on February 26.

Electronic Arts stock rises premarket as Q3 revenue hits $1.883B, exceeding expectations. Net bookings reach $2.215B but miss estimate. Meeting player demands with innovative initiatives. EPS comes in at $1.11. Expecting $1B net bookings for FY25.
news.summary: Shares of Electronic Arts Inc (NASDAQ:EA) are up in premarket trading following the announcement of third-quarter revenue of $1.883 billion, surpassing the expected $1.654 billion. However, net bookings fell short at $2.215 billion compared to the estimated $2.325 billion. Despite this, American Football experienced significant growth in weekly active users, aiming to exceed $1 billion in net bookings for FY25. The introduction of Battlefield Labs in the quarter aims to drive innovation leading up to the FY26 franchise release. Earnings per share stood at $1.11, slightly up from $1.07 in the same quarter last year. This follows the recent report of preliminary quarterly figures, indicating a positive trend for the company.

news.headline: LDRA and Dassault Systèmes partner for safety-critical software verification and certification, introducing LDRA TBmanager Integration Package for No Magic Teamwork Cloud to meet compliance standards in aerospace.
news.summary: In Wirral, England, LDRA unveiled the LDRA TBmanager Integration Package (TIP) for No Magic Teamwork Cloud. This offering integrates with Dassault Systèmes' No Magic Teamwork Cloud, facilitating model-based systems engineering and supporting engineers in conducting both low-level and high-level software requirements-based testing. This integration is crucial for meeting functional safety standards in the aerospace industry. LDRA is known for its automated software verification, traceability, and standards compliance solutions. This announcement underscores LDRA's commitment to providing comprehensive tools for ensuring regulatory compliance.

news.headline: Revlon Canada partners with professional hockey player Sarah Nurse as brand ambassador for ColorStay™ collection till 2025.
news.summary: Revlon Canada has announced a new partnership with Olympian and hockey player Sarah Nurse in Toronto. She will represent the brand's ColorStay™ collection until 2025, joining global ambassadors like Madelyn Cline and Ashley Graham. Sarah Nurse expressed her excitement, stating that the ColorStay range is essential in her daily routine, both on and off the ice. This collaboration marks a significant move for Revlon, positioning Sarah as a prominent figure for the brand in the upcoming years.

news.headline: Sojo Shield™ SuiteApp earns 'Built for NetSuite' status; approved on Oracle NetSuite SuiteCloud Platform.
news.summary: In Bristol, Pennsylvania, the Sojo Shield™ SuiteApp has recently been awarded the prestigious 'Built for NetSuite' status through the Oracle NetSuite SuiteCloud Platform. This recognition highlights the app's compatibility and seamless integration with NetSuite software, showcasing its capabilities for streamlined automation.

news.headline: SunOpta set to release Q4 and fiscal 2024 financial results on Feb 26, 2025 after markets close. Conference call at 5:30 PM ET.
news.summary: SunOpta Inc. will be releasing its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 28, 2024, after the markets close on Wednesday, February 26, 2025. The company, listed as Nasdaq: STKL and TSX: SOY, is known for being an innovative and sustainable food manufacturer. A conference call will be hosted at 5:30 p.m. Eastern Time on the same day to review the financial results and recent corporate developments.

news.headline: Katana Cloud Inventory launches Integration Marketplace and Multisite Order Feature to streamline operations for SMBs.
news.summary: In Toronto, Katana Cloud Inventory, a rapidly expanding inventory software for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), revealed the introduction of its Integration Marketplace and upgraded Multisite Order Fulfillment to assist businesses in simplifying operations and improving workflows. These solutions aim to enhance efficiency throughout the supply chain for SMBs, enabling them to scale up quickly without adding complexity to their processes. The new features are designed to empower SMBs with top-notch tools.

news.headline: Advance Auto Parts (NYSE: AAP) will release Q4 and full-year 2024 financials on Feb 26, 2025, before market opens. Conference call at 8:00 a.m. ET on the same day.
news.summary: Raleigh, North Carolina - Advance Auto Parts, Inc., a major automotive aftermarket parts supplier in North America catering to both professional installers and DIY customers, is set to announce its financial outcomes for the fourth quarter and full year ending on December 28, 2024. This disclosure will happen before the market opens on Wednesday, February 26, 2025. The company has organized a conference call and webcast starting at 8:00 a.m. ET on the same day. A live webcast will be accessible during the event.

news.headline: Brown-Forman to release Q3 fiscal 2025 results and hold conference call on March 5, 2025 at 10:00 a.m. EST.
news.summary: Louisville, Kentucky-based Brown-Forman Corporation (NYSE: BFA, BFB) is set to announce its third quarter and year-to-date fiscal 2025 financial results on March 5, 2025, at 8:00 a.m. (EST). Following this, a conference call discussing the results will take place at 10:00 a.m. (EST). Those interested can access a live audio broadcast of the call on Brown-Forman’s website, brown-forman.com, under "Investors/Events & Presentations." Additionally, a digital audio recording of the conference call will be made available.

news.headline: FDA grants Breakthrough Device Designation for ACR-368 OncoSignature Assay by Acrivon Therapeutics for endometrial cancer.
news.summary: A specialized OncoSignature assay known as ACR-368-tailored is currently being utilized to forecast the patients with the highest probability of responding positively to ACR-368 in Acrivon’s active registrational-intent Phase 2b trial. This trial is being conducted at multiple centers and focuses on patients with endometrial cancer as well as other forms of tumors.

news.headline: Republicans on Capitol Hill are working on crypto regulations promised to deliver policy wins for the industry.
news.summary: For a long time, Republican lawmakers in Congress have pledged to provide the cryptocurrency sector with comprehensive policy victories.

news.headline: Algorhythm Holdings to undergo a reverse stock split with a ratio between 1:10 and 1:250, decided by the board.
news.summary: Algorhythm Holdings, Inc. announced today that a reverse stock split of their Common Stock, under ticker symbol NASDAQ: RIME, will soon be implemented. The company's annual meeting of stockholders on January 13, 2025, saw approval for Proposal 3 which involves amending the Certificate of Incorporation for the split. The reverse split will have a ratio ranging from one-for-ten to one-for-two-hundred-and-fifty, to be determined by the Board before January 13, 2026. This strategic move is aimed at enhancing shareholder value and streamlining the company's stock structure.

news.headline: Twin Disc approves a quarterly cash dividend of $0.04 per share, payable to shareholders on March 3, 2025.
news.summary: In Milwaukee, Wisconsin, on February 5, 2025, Twin Disc, Inc. (NASDAQ: TWIN) disclosed that their Board of Directors authorized a standard quarterly cash dividend of $0.04 per share. This dividend is set to be distributed on March 3, 2025, to shareholders recorded at the end of business on February 17, 2025.

news.headline: e-therapeutics to discuss ETX-148 preclinical data for haemophilia treatment at EAHAD 2025; IND submission in 2026.
news.summary: In London on February 5, 2025, e-therapeutics plc disclosed plans to unveil fresh preclinical findings regarding the effectiveness and safety of ETX-148 in murine models of haemophilia A and B at the 2025 Annual Congress of the European Association for Haemophilia and Allied Disorders from February 4th to 7th. ETX-148, aimed at addressing bleeding disorders, is in the process of advancing through IND-enabling investigations, with an anticipated IND submission slated for 2026. This company merges computational capabilities with biological data to identify groundbreaking RNAi medications.

news.headline: Asia Broadband is close to completing a new AABB Wallet with an On/Off ramp for AABBG token transactions. Adding TrumpCoin and Elon Musk Coin.
news.summary: In Las Vegas on Feb.  05, 2025, Asia Broadband Inc. (OTC: AABB) provided an update stating that they are close to finalizing the implementation of an On/Off ramp mechanism in the upcoming AABB Wallet. This enhancement is designed to facilitate transactions involving the AABBG token and other cryptocurrencies. The integration of this mechanism is currently in the final stages and is crucial for receiving approval from both Google Play and Apple App stores. Furthermore, taking advantage of the favorable cryptocurrency market conditions, the Company will be introducing TrumpCoin (TRUMP) and Elon Musk Coin (MUSK) to the new AABB Wallet. Asia Broadband Inc. plans to include more tokens and features in the wallet in the future.

news.headline: Uni-Fuels sponsors IBIA Annual Dinner 2025, to be held on Feb. 24 at Grosvenor House Hotel in London.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, a global marine fuel solutions provider, Uni-Fuels Holdings Limited (NASDAQ: UFG), based in Singapore, revealed its bronze sponsorship of the International Bunker Industry Association (IBIA) Annual Dinner 2025. The event is scheduled for February 24 at the Grosvenor House Hotel in Mayfair, London.

news.headline: Landus and TalusAg launch first local green ammonia production in North America, using modular systems.
news.summary: Agriculture solutions company Landus, based in Iowa, and agriculture technology company TalusAg have confirmed the start of commercial green ammonia production in North America with the first modular systems. This marks a significant milestone as it is the only setup of its kind in the region. The partnership aims to establish local, domestic production of green ammonia using TalusAg’s efficient systems. This ensures that American farmers have access to a cost-effective, dependable, and eco-friendly source of fertilizer. The companies are focused on providing a sustainable solution for farmers and reducing reliance on imports.

news.headline: Ventyx Biosciences (Nasdaq: VTYX) to join Oppenheimer 35th Annual Healthcare Life Sciences Conference, presenting innovative oral therapies.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in San Diego, Ventyx Biosciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: VTYX), a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, revealed its participation in the upcoming Oppenheimer 35th Annual Healthcare Life Sciences Conference. Ventyx is devoted to creating groundbreaking oral treatments for individuals battling autoimmune, inflammatory, and neurodegenerative illnesses. This development signifies the company's commitment to advancing the field.

news.headline: Aprea Therapeutics updates IP portfolio in DNA damage response cancer therapies. $APRE (Nasdaq) announces strategic progress.
news.summary: A clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, Aprea Therapeutics, Inc. (Nasdaq: APRE), based in Doylestown, Pennsylvania, announced on February 5, 2025, an update on its patent portfolio. The company focuses on developing treatments that target specific vulnerabilities in cancer cells to reduce harm to healthy cells.

news.headline: Atossa Therapeutics celebrates Dr. Tessa Cigler and Weill Cornell's CDC grant of $2.3M to enhance breast cancer care in NYC.
news.summary: Atossa Therapeutics, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on breast cancer prevention and treatment, congratulates Dr. Tessa Cigler and the Weill Cornell Medicine team for receiving a $2.3 million grant from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. The five-year grant will support efforts to enhance access to care, quality of life, and survival rates for young breast cancer patients in New York City. Dr. Cigler, a Board Director at Atossa and Associate Professor of Clinical Medicine at Weill Cornell Medicine, was recognized for her contributions to this initiative.

news.headline: WillScot will reveal Q4 2024 earnings on Feb 20, 2025, after market close. (Company: WillScot, Stock: Nasdaq: WSC)
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, WillScot Holdings Corporation, a prominent provider of temporary flexible space solutions, stated that it will disclose its financial results for the fourth quarter of 2024 on February 20, 2025, following the market's closure. The company, known as WillScot and listed as WSC on Nasdaq, is anticipated to provide important insights into its financial performance during the final quarter of 2024. This announcement marks a pivotal moment for investors and industry analysts as they await the release of key figures for the specified period.

news.headline: Vaxcyte progresses to Phase 2 for VAX-31 for infant pneumococcal disease prevention; expects key data by mid-2026.
news.summary: Progressing to Stage 2 of the infant study comes following a comprehensive evaluation of safety and tolerability data from Stage 1. The company is looking forward to revealing the topline safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity data of the VAX-31 infant study's primary immunization series around mid-2026. Subsequently, the outcomes of the booster dose are anticipated approximately nine months later.

news.headline: Kroger Health and Express Scripts sign new agreement to enhance access to care for customers. CINCINNATI, Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: Kroger Health, a division of The Kroger Co., has recently entered into a new agreement with Express Scripts to enhance access to quality healthcare for customers. This agreement aims to provide convenient and high-quality care to Express Scripts customers. The agreement, disclosed on Feb. 5, 2025, marks a significant step in improving healthcare services. The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), an influential player in the industry, is optimistic about the potential benefits this collaboration will bring to both companies.
